Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Milestones.Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Relates to the cost of maintenance and operation of local veterans' service agencies
Summary: Provides that the state shall cover the cost of maintenance and operation of local veterans' service agencies up to certain set limits.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to the cost of maintenance and operation of veterans' service agencies
